content.prompt: Which of the following most directly facilitated the Axis military success alluded to in the second paragraph?

choices.label: The United States failed to ratify the League of Nations treaty.
Strong racist ideologies developed in fascist states.
The policy of appeasement pursued by Britain and France allowed Germany to rearm.
The growth of fascist parties in Britain and France undermined those nationsâ€™ resistance to Nazi Germany and fascist Italy.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
